_comments.desired_signal: Trade direction: 'BUY' for long positions, 'SELL' for short positions, 'BOTH' for both directions
_comments.risk_percentage: Percentage of account balance to risk per trade (recommended: 1-2%)
_comments.signal_check_interval: How often to check for new trading signals (seconds)
_comments.position_check_interval: How often to monitor open positions (seconds)

_comments.priority_list: List of trading symbols to search for in order of priority. First available symbol will be selected. Examples: ['EURUSD'] for forex, ['BTCUSD'] for crypto, ['US30'] for indices
